name: Ghost Hitch
description:
The Ghost Squad needs your help to rescue all the baby ghosts kidnapped by evil toys.

Guide Norman and his friends through levels full of puzzles and quests to solve.
Rescue the baby ghosts, avoid dangerous obstacles and enemies, collect stars, unlock new characters and defeat the bosses!

FEATURES:

  • 7 Themed Areas to explore
  • 8 Different Playable Characters with unique skills
  • 10 Special Powers to power up your ghost
  • Evil Bosses to defeat
  • Hidden Bonus Levels and tons of secrets

Fun is assured for everyone! 👻

Note: "Ghost Hitch" was designed for mobile devices, therefore the screen resolution and controls are adapted to those. In this Windows version the controller is your cursor and some mobile specific menu functions are not available.
